A mayo themed html format

mayohtml.Rd

A mayo themed html format

mayohtml(
  toc = FALSE,
  toc_float = TRUE,
  toc_depth = 6,
  number_sections = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

toc

logical; TRUE to include a table of contents in the output
toc_float

TRUE to float the table of contents to the left of the main document content.
toc_depth

Depth of headers to include in table of contents
number_sections

logical; TRUE to number section headings
...

Additional arguments passed to rmarkdown::html_document

Contents

  • Arguments
